labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: It gets stuck at the "new" box, forcing you to mark as read
data.expected_result: The server moves just fine past it
data.short_description: If you have the "New" square when you get a mention, you can't drag servers past it
data.steps_to_repro: - Have enough servers to where if you get a mention in a lower one while your in a higher one, you'll get the "New" toast thingie - Get the Toast notification - Try dragging a server past the toast
